inputs.prompt: Cinematic portrait of a young beautiful Latina woman with dark hair and bangs, in a vibrant, neon-lit Japanese arcade at night. She looks back over her shoulder at the camera with an intense, captivating gaze. The scene is drenched in a dreamy, moody atmosphere. Her face is dramatically illuminated by the strong pink and magenta glow from a nearby arcade machine, casting soft shadows, while cool cyan neon light creates sharp highlights on her hair and the side of her face. The shot is taken through a glass panel, creating distorted, colorful neon light reflections and a sense of depth. Shallow depth of field blurs the background into a beautiful bokeh of orange and yellow lights. Light film grain, subtle film texture, detailed realistic skin texture, glossy lips, neon-noir aesthetic.
